GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

ALL /*.description: serves up 404 error when entered path is incorrect

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an array of one article by article_id

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments of an article
